verbs.description: With [ARG1: many families] [V: displaced] [ARG0: by Hurricane Maria] [ARGM-PRD: facing potential homelessness when federal aid runs out on June 30] , Massachusetts lawmakers again urged the Trump administration this week to provide long - term housing assistance to Puerto Rico evacuees .

With [ARG0: many families displaced by Hurricane Maria] [V: facing] [ARG1: potential homelessness] [ARGM-TMP: when federal aid runs out on June 30] , Massachusetts lawmakers again urged the Trump administration this week to provide long - term housing assistance to Puerto Rico evacuees .
